author: hwright
msg: Fix test backported in r30838 but not adjusted to still use 1.5
If we roll another rc after rc4, it must include this backport.
(The previous broken backport was not in rc4, though.)

author: hwright
msg: Fix abort in ra_serf when server sends invalid xml during replay.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r30868, r30871 from the 1.5.x-r30868 branch:
In svnserve, tolerate unreadable passwd files.
Don't error over svn+ssh:// when the user can't read passwd.
Notes: epg points out that this may not apply cleanly due to
svnserve logging changes on trunk.  The necessary adjustments
should be trivial / non-controversial, but as epg's logging
changes involved some block rearrangement, the merge adjustments
will be textually larger than one might expect.  Caveat Codor.
